definition: of or relating to or belonging to the family Caeciliidae, any of the small slender limbless burrowing wormlike amphibians of the order Gymnophiona
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or belonging to the family Caeciliidae
noun
- any of the small slender limbless burrowing wormlike amphibians of the order Gymnophiona
= synonyms: blindworm
